TITLE: :wrench: Join system :
DESCRIPTION: If it doesn't work, check the bot permissions or join our [support server]({{discord}})
ENABLED_YES_CONTENT: {{success}} Join messages enabled. Disable them with `{{prefix}}setjoin`.
ENABLED_NO_CONTENT: {{error}} Join messages disabled. Enable them with `{{prefix}}setjoin`.
CHANNEL_CONTENT: No channel defined. Set it with `{{prefix}}configjoin`!
MESSAGE_CONTENT: No message defined. Set it with `{{prefix}}configjoin`!
